column6: The zombies' battle with the Silver Surfer was just a schoolyard brawl compared to the threat he heralded. Will our flesh-eating undead heroes remain undead, or will this threat from space make them even deader? No Marvel Zombie should miss it!
column8: | colorist:June Chung | letterer:Randy Gentile | writer:Robert Kirkman | penciller:Sean Phillips | penciller (cover):Arthur Suydam
